page.title: 16Games We Play cont.
page.content: The first person throws a stone into square 1.You then have to hop on single squares and jump with two feet on double squares to the top of the grid and back.On the way back you pick up your stone in one hand and jump off the grid.You progress through the numbers unless you touch a line with your foot or hand.Each player takes a turn,the winner is the first to complete all ten goes. {Semi Circle}is a running game played on a hard pitch with a marked semi circle at each end.The object of the game is to run from one semi to the other without being had.There is one person who is He,they must try to catch as many people as possible.To avoid being captured we often form a link with each other.The person who is He then tries to break the chain,as we must be caught one at a time.
